name: SMB
description: Server Message Block (SMB), typically used by Microsoft file sharing.

name: SMB
description: Server Message Block (SMB), typically used by Microsoft file sharing.

name: NTDS
description: New Technology Directory Service

name: DCOM Launcher
description: The DCOMLAUNCH service launches COM and DCOM servers in response to object activation.

name: Windows Time
description: Maintains date and time synchronization on all clients and servers in the network.

name: NT File Replication Service
description: Synchronizes folders with file servers that use File Replication Service (FRS) instead of the newer DFS Replication technology.

name: Security Accounts Manager
description: The startup of this service signals other services that the Security Accounts Manager (SAM) is ready to accept requests.

name: DCE/RPC Locator
description: DCE/RPC Used to remotely manage services like DHCP server, DNS server and WINS.

name: Windows Management Instrumentation
description: Provides a common interface and object model to access management information about operating system, devices, applications and services.

name: NetBIOS Session Service
description: Used for connection-oriented communication.

name: NetBIOS Name Service
description: Used by Microsoft operating systems for short name registration and resolution.

name: NetBIOS Name Service
description: Used by Microsoft operating systems for short name registration and resolution.

name: Remote Procedure Call
description: The RPCSS service is the Service Control Manager for COM and DCOM servers. It performs object activations requests, object exporter resolutions and distributed garbage collection for COM and DCOM servers.

name: Link-Local Multicast Name Resolution
description: Link-Local Multicast Name Resolution (LLMNR) (dnscache) caches Domain Name System (DNS) names, allowing them to be accessed via LLMNR multicast requests.

name: Event Log
description: This service manages events and event logs. It supports logging events, querying events, subscribing to events, archiving event logs, and managing event metadata.

name: LLMNR (Port-Based)
description: LLMNR (dnscache) caches Domain Name System (DNS) names, allowing them to be accessed via LLMNR multicast requests. This is the port based version of this service to assist in enabling the multicast part of the protocol.

name: NetLogon
description: This service is responsible for creating Secure Channel between Domain Controllers and client computers. Secure Channel is created to pass the authentication packets.

name: Kerberos
description: The Microsoft specific version of Kerberos authentication

name: LSASS Services
description: Some high port services that use LSASS.EXE don't have Microsoft services attached to them. This Illumio service serves as a catch all to these services.

name: Distributed File System Replication
description: Distributed File System Replication (DFSR) enables you to synchronize folders on multiple servers across local or wide area network (WAN).

name: DNS
description: Domain Name System

name: DNS
description: Domain Name System

name: Kerberos-v5
description: Kerberos Version 5

name: Kerberos-v5
description: Kerberos Version 5

name: RPC Endpoint Mapper
description: Resolves Remote Procedure Call (RPC) interfaces identifiers to transport endpoints.

name: NetBIOS Datagram Service
description: This provides NetBOIS Datagram distribution service (NetBIOS-DGM) for connectionless communication.

name: Distributed File System Namespce
description: Enables you to group shared folders located on different servers into one or more logically structured namespaces. Each namespace appears to users as a single shared folder with a series of subfolders.

name: LDAP
description: Lightweight Directory Access Protocol

name: LDAP
description: Lightweight Directory Access Protocol

name: LDAPS
description: Secure LDAP

name: LDAPS
description: Secure LDAP

name: MSFT DNS
description: Microsoft Domain Name System. Typically used on Domain Controllers.
